title: Task Manager App
description: A task management application built with React and Node.js, featuring real-time collaboration and an intuitive UI.

title: E-commerce Platform
description: Developed a scalable e-commerce platform using Django and React, integrating secure payment gateways and a user-friendly interface.

title: Social Media Dashboard
description: Created a social media dashboard with Vue.js and Express, providing real-time analytics and post-scheduling capabilities.

title: Online Learning Portal
description: Built an online learning portal with Python and Angular, featuring interactive courses, quizzes, and progress tracking.

title: Blogging Platform
description: Developed a blogging platform using Ruby on Rails and React, offering rich text editing and seamless content management.

title: Fitness Tracker
description: Implemented a fitness tracker app with Node.js and React Native, enabling users to log workouts and monitor progress.

title: Real Estate Listing
description: Created a real estate listing website with Laravel and Vue.js, featuring advanced search filters and property management tools.

title: Weather Forecast App
description: Built a weather forecast application using React and Visual Crossing API, providing accurate weather updates and forecasts.

title: Event Management App
description: Developed an event management system with ASP.NET Core and Angular, featuring event scheduling, ticketing, and attendee tracking.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Designed and developed a personal portfolio website using Gatsby and GraphQL, showcasing projects and skills with a sleek design.
